Text: Thanks Man, but whats the FPS on this one? Im really tempted to download this, but if there is going to be a 48fps version in the future im gonna wait, but thanks for the great effort always, BOZX

I dont think you got equipment that can play back 48fps dude. After you buy new TV then you gotta wait till theres a 48fps BD standard, and your bd player gets an update. How likely is that considering those barsted manufacturers that dont give updates so you'll buy new stuff every year?
